mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cloud_disk_files( original_name, targe_name, file_size, ext_name, own_user, file_sign, file_type, oss_key, bucker_name, is_del, upload_time, upload_user )values( #{originalName}, #{targeName}, #{fileSize}, #{extName}, #{ownUser}, #{fileSign}, #{fileType}, #{ossKey}, #{buckerName}, #{isDel}, #{uploadTime}, #{uploadUser} )
mapper.select: select 1 fileType, count(1) fileTypeCount, ifnull(sum(t.file_size),0) usedFileSize from cloud_disk_files t where t.own_user=#{ownUser} and t.is_del=0 and t.file_type = 1 union select 2 fileType, count(1) fileTypeCount, ifnull(sum(t.file_size),0) usedFileSize from cloud_disk_files t where t.own_user=#{ownUser} and t.is_del=0 and t.file_type = 2 union select 3 fileType, count(1) fileTypeCount, ifnull(sum(t.file_size),0) usedFileSize from cloud_disk_files t where t.own_user=#{ownUser} and t.is_del=0 and t.file_type = 3
select sum(t.file_size) fileSize from cloud_disk_files t where t.is_del=0 and t.own_user=#{ownUser}
